name: Phoebe Flingle Finger
description:
Phoebe Flingle Finger

There is no such thing as an easy life, but Phoebe has had it up to here. Help her point out all the BS surrounding her and embarge on a comedic story about a fed up woman fighting for her place in life.

Phoebe Flingle Finger is a webcomic style game that lets you progress the narration directly by moving through each chapter.

Play the first chapter "work hard, play hard".  Chapter 2 in development.

Controlls: 

- Click and drag where you want Phoebes finger to go.

- Press "r" to retract her finger.

- Press "esc" to go back to the menu.

Thats it! You are good to go ;)

Want more of Phoebe and other Games? Support me here.
